summary.para: Describes compute shader and raw and structured buffer support in the current graphics driver.

remarks.para: Direct3D 11 devices (D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL_11_0) are required to support Compute Shader model 5.0. Direct3D 10.x devices (D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL_10_0, D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL_10_1) can optionally support Compute Shader model 4.0 or 4.1.

summary.para: TRUE if compute shaders and raw and structured buffers are supported; otherwise FALSE.
